accuracy.description: The correctness of the final answer provided by the multi-agent system with respect to the task’s requirements.

completeness.description: The extent to which the agents provide a full and comprehensive answer that covers all aspects of the question.

reasoning_traceability.description: The ability to follow the reasoning process and logical steps taken by the agents to reach the final answer.

execution_efficiency.description: How efficiently the agents execute the necessary steps to complete the task, in terms of both time and resources used.

robustness_to_diversity.description: The agents’ ability to handle diverse and unexpected aspects of the task without failure or significant decrease in performance.

data_contamination_prevention.description: How effectively the agents avoid incorporating contaminated or irrelevant data from the internet that could lead to incorrect answers.

responding_to_barriers.description: The system’s capability to overcome obstacles and limitations encountered during the task and still provide useful results.
